languages.text: "Тайное проникновение на корабль Вольного Торговца, на котором действуют авторизованные технопровидцы, вызывает сомнения в стабильности моего собрата — если это действительно мой собрат. В любом случае — запрашиваю разрешение на коммуникацию с пойманным".

"This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."
languages.original_text: "Тайное проникновение на корабль Вольного Торговца, на котором действуют авторизованные технопровидцы, вызывает сомнения в стабильности моего собрата — если это действительно мой собрат. В любом случае — запрашиваю разрешение на коммуникацию с пойманным".

traits.locale_text: "A secret intrusion into a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised enginseers makes me doubt my brother's stability — if he is actually my brother. Either way, I request permission for communication with the captured."

"A secret intrusion into a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised enginseers makes me doubt my brother's stability — if he is actually my brother. Either way, I request permission for communication with the captured."

"An unnoticed intrusion into a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised enginseers makes me doubt my comrade's stability, that is if we are indeed comrades. Either way, I request permission for communication with the captive."

"An unnoticed intrusion into a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised enginseers makes me doubt my comrade's stability, that is if we are indeed comrades. Either way, I request permission for communication with the captive."

"This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."

languages.text: “未经允许潜入行商浪人的舰船，忤逆引擎先知的权威，我不禁怀疑我这位技术伙伴的精神状态是否稳定……假如他真的是我的技术伙伴的话。总之，我请求允许我与那个俘虏进行交流。”
languages.original_text: "This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."

traits.locale_text: “未经允许潜入行商浪人的舰船，忤逆引擎先知的权威，我不禁怀疑我这位技术伙伴的精神状态是否稳定……假如他真的是我的技术伙伴的话。总之，我请求允许我与那个俘虏进行交流。”

languages.text: « Cette infiltration du vaisseau d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} aux mains de technaugures assermentés sème le doute quant à la stabilité de mon technoconfrère... si tant est qu'il s'agisse bel et bien de l'un de mes coreligionnaires. Quoi qu'il en soit, je vous demande l'autorisation de communiquer avec le captif. »
languages.original_text: "This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."

traits.locale_text: « Cette infiltration du vaisseau d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} aux mains de technaugures assermentés sème le doute quant à la stabilité de mon technoconfrère... si tant est qu'il s'agisse bel et bien de l'un de mes coreligionnaires. Quoi qu'il en soit, je vous demande l'autorisation de communiquer avec le captif. »

languages.text: "Dieses Eindringen in das Schiff {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}, das von autorisierten Maschinensehern betrieben wird, stellt die Stabilität meines Techkameraden in Frage ... wenn es sich denn um einen Techkameraden handelt. Wie dem auch sei, ich bitte um Erlaubnis, mit dem Gefangenen zu kommunizieren."
languages.original_text: "This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Eindringen in das Schiff {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin}, das von autorisierten Maschinensehern betrieben wird, stellt die Stabilität meines Techkameraden in Frage ... wenn es sich denn um einen Techkameraden handelt. Wie dem auch sei, ich bitte um Erlaubnis, mit dem Gefangenen zu kommunizieren."

languages.text: «La infiltración de la nave de un Comerciante Independiente operada por visioingenieros autorizados pone en duda la estabilidad de mi tecnocamarada... si es que es mi tecnocamarada. De todos modos, solicito permiso para comunicarme con el cautivo».
languages.original_text: "This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."

traits.locale_text: «La infiltración de la nave de un Comerciante Independiente operada por visioingenieros autorizados pone en duda la estabilidad de mi tecnocamarada... si es que es mi tecnocamarada. De todos modos, solicito permiso para comunicarme con el cautivo».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の船への潜入は、公認の機関整備師により操作されていました。技術仲間に疑いの目を向けるしかない…。彼が本当に私の技術同胞なら、ですが。ともかく、捕虜との通信許可を要求します」
languages.original_text: "This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の船への潜入は、公認の機関整備師により操作されていました。技術仲間に疑いの目を向けるしかない…。彼が本当に私の技術同胞なら、ですが。ともかく、捕虜との通信許可を要求します」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in yetkili Mühedyumlarca idare edilen bir gemisine sızılmış olması, tekno yoldaşımın istikrarından şüphe duymama sebep oluyor... Tabii kendisi sahiden tekno yoldaşımsa. Müsaadeniz olursa tutsakla konuşmak isterim."
languages.original_text: "This infiltration of a Rogue Trader's ship operated by authorised Enginseers casts doubts on my tech-comrade's stability... if he is indeed my tech-comrade, that is. Regardless, I request permission to communicate with the captive."
